goal_completion.description: Whether the player completed the task goal or not.

num_actions.description: The number of actions taken to complete the task.

num_invalid_actions.description: The number of invalid actions performed during the task.

thought_process.description: The clarity and quality of the thought process shared before taking actions.

sequence_of_actions.description: How effective and well-planned the sequence of actions was, leading to the completion or partial completion of the task.

interaction_with_environment.description: How well the player interacted with the environment, including using available objects, and how efficient they were.

use_of_terminate.description: Whether 'TERMINATE' was used correctly according to the task instructions.
